about_the_game:
Embark on a Thrilling Adventure in Mecha Attack!

Venture into the captivating world of Mecha Attack, an anime RPG gacha game that combines epic combat, exploration, and the excitement of collecting characters. Fight against formidable Mechas, unlock new characters and explore diverse planets inspired by our own solar system, each offering unique challenges and surprises.

Key Features:

Dynamic Mecha Battles: Engage in action-packed battles against powerful Mechas. Utilize skill-based combat, strategic dodging, and unleash character-specific abilities to secure victory.

Collect and Customize Characters: Embark on your journey with a roster of 10 distinct characters, each boasting elemental abilities and unique ultimate attacks. Collect characters through the gacha system and customize their loadouts to match your preferred playstyle.

Online and Offline Play: Join forces with up to four players in the online multiplayer mode or tackle challenges alone in offline single-player mode. Conquer enemies and explore planets.


Cross-Platform Adventure: Seamlessly continue your journey across various platforms with cross-platform play and progression.

Embark on the Ultimate Adventure!
